file_content.text: The troops all know what you did for them back there. Asked me to thank you personally.
I found your men. They're going to be okay.
Thanks. Imperials have been tearing us up good lately. Seen too many good men cut down.
Glad I'll be able to send at least a few back to their families, safe and sound.
Don't worry about me. Medic pumped me with enough tranq to knock out a bantha. Just get to those wounded.
You... you any good with a suture? Know how to dress a wound?
I'm no doctor, but I've picked up a few things.
I can do that.
I'm familiar with several healing techniques.
Of course.
I've had basic medical training. Know my way around a medpac.
I do.
I know enough not to make it worse.
More or less.
Good enough.
You look like you need both.
Got a cracked sternum and a couple broken ribs, but it's not for me.
Not really.
This is no time to get squeamish.
I've got wounded in the field. Patrol unit, ambushed by Imperials. Hit 'em hard and... ah, sedatives just kicked in.
Area's too hot to send a medic. Need someone who can get in, fix my men up and get out in one piece.
You can depend on me.
Maybe it's just the tranq talking, but I think you can do it.
How do you even know your men are still alive?
They could be dead.
I can still hear them groaning over the comm. That's all the proof I need.
Here's an emergency medical pack. Should have everything you need.
Remember, this is just a patch job, something to get them moving. Don't get fancy.
Too dangerous. [Refuse quest]
Yeah, leave it to the guy with the chest fracture.
Can't talk. Concussion grenade. Hard to breathe.
